item.description:
AWBL Holiday Gathering at Savvy Tea
December 16th, 11:30-1pm

Join us to usher in the season at our annual holiday lunch, featuring the following selections:



1. Carrot, ginger & artichoke soup with Vegetarian salad or Pear Salad with gorgonzola and walnuts
$19

2. Tuna or Vermonter (ham) panini
$15.50

3. Mango Chicken Sandwich or Avocado Wrap
$13

4. Carrot, ginger & artichoke soup
$10.50



Price includes one cup of special holiday black tea or green tea, dessert, tax and tip.

Pre-order requested, pay at the luncheon.



*Please bring a small toy or non perishable food item to donate to a special cause on behalf of AWBL
** Sharon Massoth, intuitive therapist will be offering individual "angel reading" scrolls
item.name: AWBL Holiday Luncheon
